name: Use Case Diagram View
description: UML-compliant use case visualization with actors and associations

renderConfig.renderingNotes: Radial layout with UC nodes in center, ACTOR nodes in outer ring. Standard UML use case diagram appearance.

primaryRelationships: relation (ACTOR --relation--> UC): actor participates in use case
relation (UC --relation--> UC): use case includes/extends another
validationRules: Every leaf UC (no child UC) must have at least one ACTOR
ACTOR can only connect to UC via relation edges
UC can have include/extend relationships (represented as relation edges)
notes: Follows UML 2.5 use case diagram conventions
System boundary (optional) drawn as rectangle around UC nodes
ACTOR nodes positioned outside system boundary
UC nodes positioned inside system boundary
Radial layout ensures clear visibility of all actors
Ideal for stakeholder presentations and requirements reviews
